metadata.title: CVE-2018-11698 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in LibSass through 3.5.4. An out-of-bounds read ofa memory region was found in the function Sass::handle_error which could beleveraged by an attacker to disclose information or manipulated to readfrom unmapped memory causing a denial of service.

criterions.comment: libsass: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
